message.name: ERR_MULTIPLEACTIVEHGCASES
message.locale: There can only be one Health Grant Case in an 'Active' status for a client '%1s' on the date of service (%2d).

message.name: INF_SUPPLIERRETURNLINEITEM_DUPLICATE_SERVICE_ON_DATE
message.locale: A duplicate service may exist on the following date %1d due to a service supplier return.

message.name: INF_SUPPLIERRETURNLINEITEM_DUPLICATE_SERVICE_SUB
message.locale: A duplicate service entry may exist for this case.

message.name: ERR_MULTIPLEHEALTHGRANTPRODUCTPROVIDERS
message.locale: There can only be one health grant product provider.

message.name: ERR_ACTIVEHEALTHGRANTPRODUCTPROVIDER_RNFE
message.locale: An active health grant product provider could not be found
